title: How to Change Who Can See Your Profile Photo on WhatsApp

steps.title: Open WhatsApp.
steps.content: Open WhatsApp. The WhatsApp icon has a white telephone in a speech bubble on a green background.

steps.title: Go to your WhatsApp settings.
steps.content: Go to your WhatsApp settings. On iPhone or iPad, tap on the gear icon at the bottom right-hand corner of the screen. On Android, tap the ⋮ in the upper right corner and select Settings .

steps.title: Tap Account.
steps.content: Tap Account . This icon has a white key on a blue background.

steps.title: Tap Privacy.
steps.content: Tap Privacy . This is the option on the top.

steps.title: Tap Profile Photo.
steps.content: Tap Profile Photo . This option is second down from the top.

steps.title: Select the option you prefer.
steps.content: Select the option you prefer. Tap Everyone if you want anyone on WhatsApp to be able to see your profile picture. Tap My Contacts if you want only your WhatsApp contacts to see your profile picture. Tap "My Contacts except… " if you don’t want certain WhatsApp contacts seeing your profile picture. Tap Nobody if you don’t want anyone on WhatsApp to see your profile picture.

steps.title: Tap < to save the settings.
steps.content: Tap < to save the settings. The screen will go back to the previous page and will briefly show “Updating…” at the top of the page. It will then refresh and save your updated choice.
